verses.verse: (For the choir director. A Psalm of David.) I <S%H6960>waited<s%> <S%H6960>patiently<s%> for the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> And He <S%H5186>inclined<s%> to me, and <S%H8085>heard<s%> my <S%H7775>cry.<s%>

He <S%H5927>brought<s%> me up out of the <S%H953>pit<s%> of <S%H7588>destruction,<s%> out of the <S%H3121>miry<s%> <S%H2916>clay;<s%> And He <S%H6965>set<s%> my <S%H7272>feet<s%> upon a <S%H5553>rock<s%> <S%H3559>making<s%> my <S%H9036>footsteps<s%> <S%H3559>firm.<s%>

And He <S%H5414>put<s%> a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H7892>song<s%> in my <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> a <S%H8416>song<s%> of <S%H8416>praise<s%> to our <S%H430>God;<s%> <S%H7227>Many<s%> will <S%H7200>see<s%> and <S%H3372>fear,<s%> And will <S%H982>trust<s%> in the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

How <S%H835>blessed<s%> is the <S%H1397>man<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> has <S%H7760>made<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> his <S%H4009>trust,<s%> And has not <S%H6437>turned<s%> to the <S%H7295>proud,<s%> nor to those who <S%H7750>lapse<s%> into <S%H3577>falsehood.<s%>

<S%H7227>Many,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord<s%> my <S%H430>God,<s%> are the <S%H6381>wonders<s%> which Thou hast <S%H6213>done,<s%> And Thy <S%H4284>thoughts<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> us; <S%H369>There<s%> is <S%H369>none<s%> to <S%H6186>compare<s%> with Thee; If I would <S%H5046>declare<s%> and <S%H1696>speak<s%> of them, They would be <S%H4480>too<s%> <S%H6105>numerous<s%> to <S%H5608>count.<s%>

<S%H2077>Sacrifice<s%> and <S%H4503>meal<s%> <S%H4503>offering<s%> Thou hast not <S%H2654>desired;<s%> My <S%H241>ears<s%> Thou hast <S%H3738>opened;<s%> <S%H5930>Burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> and <S%H2401>sin<s%> <S%H2401>offering<s%> Thou hast not <S%H7592>required.<s%>
<S%H227>Then<s%> I <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> I <S%H935>come;<s%> In the <S%H4039>scroll<s%> of the <S%H5612>book<s%> it is <S%H3789>written<s%> of me;
I <S%H2654>delight<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> Thy <S%H7522>will,<s%> O my <S%H430>God;<s%> Thy <S%H8451>Law<s%> is <S%H8432>within<s%> my <S%H4578>heart.<s%> "

I have <S%H1319>proclaimed<s%> <S%H1319>glad<s%> <S%H1319>tidings<s%> of <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> in the <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H6951>congregation;<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I will not <S%H3607>restrain<s%> my <S%H8193>lips,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> Thou <S%H3045>knowest.<s%>

I have not <S%H3680>hidden<s%> Thy <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> <S%H8432>within<s%> my <S%H3820>heart;<s%> I have <S%H559>spoken<s%> of Thy <S%H530>faithfulness<s%> and Thy <S%H8668>salvation;<s%> I have not <S%H3582>concealed<s%> Thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> and Thy <S%H571>truth<s%> from the <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H6951>congregation.<s%>

Thou, O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> wilt not <S%H3607>withhold<s%> Thy <S%H7356>compassion<s%> from me; Thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> and Thy <S%H571>truth<s%> will <S%H8548>continually<s%> <S%H5341>preserve<s%> me.

For <S%H9567>evils<s%> <S%H5704>beyond<s%> <S%H369><s%> <S%H4557>number<s%> have <S%H661>surrounded<s%> me; My <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> have <S%H5381>overtaken<s%> me, so that I am not <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H7200>see;<s%> They are <S%H4480>more<s%> <S%H6105>numerous<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> the <S%H8185>hairs<s%> of my <S%H7218>head;<s%> And my <S%H3820>heart<s%> has <S%H5800>failed<s%> me.
Be <S%H7521>pleased,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> to <S%H5337>deliver<s%> me; <S%H2363>Make<s%> <S%H2363>haste,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> to <S%H5833>help<s%> me.

Let those be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> and <S%H3637>humiliated<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> Who <S%H1245>seek<s%> my <S%H5315>life<s%> to <S%H5595>destroy<s%> it; Let those be <S%H5472>turned<s%> <S%H268>back<s%> and <S%H3637>dishonored<s%> <S%H2655>Who<s%> <S%H2655>delight<s%> in my <S%H9567>hurt.<s%>
Let those be <S%H8074>appalled<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> <S%H6118><s%> of their <S%H1322>shame<s%> Who <S%H559>say<s%> to me, <S%H1889>"Aha,<s%> <S%H1889>aha!<s%>"

Let <S%H3605>all<s%> who <S%H1245>seek<s%> Thee <S%H7797>rejoice<s%> and be <S%H8055>glad<s%> in Thee; Let those who <S%H157>love<s%> Thy <S%H8668>salvation<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H8548>continually,<s%> "The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> be <S%H1431>magnified!<s%>"

Since I am <S%H6041>afflicted<s%> and <S%H34>needy,<s%> Let the <S%H136>Lord<s%> be <S%H2803>mindful<s%> of me; Thou art my <S%H5833>help<s%> and my <S%H6403>deliverer;<s%> Do not <S%H309>delay,<s%> O my <S%H430>God.<s%>
